title: General question on display assembly
message:
If a 2014 MBA w[SIZE=12px][FONT=Arial]orks fine when the internal display is disconnected and an external display is used can you clear the GPU of fault
and implicate the display assembly.

Please understand that I am just learning and wanted to know if it was worth the trouble to swap out the screen assembly if this was the case.[/FONT][/SIZE]

title: General question on display assembly
message:
MBA has only iGPU, integrated on CPU.
If you get external video, very likely to have a problem with internal LCD.
But keep in mind, internal (for internal LCD) and external outputs of iGPU are separated.

Are you missing both image and backlight of internal LCD?
